name: "Holy Crap" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How long did Grandpa Griffin work at a mill?
questions.explanation:
Sixty years.

	Finally, Grandpa Griffin is retiring, and Peter asks him to live with his family.  Grandpa makes all kinds of trouble.

questions.text: During Peter's three-legged race flashback, what place did he come in?
questions.explanation:
Third.

	Peter had to run the race tied to a stalk of corn because his father wouldn't attend the father-son picnic.

questions.text: What is Grandpa Griffin's first name?
questions.explanation:
Francis.

	Grandpa Griffin becomes recognized for his many years of work at the mill during a celebration at the Mariners Banquet Hall.  This is where we first hear his name.

questions.text: What book does Grandpa Griffin read to Stewie before bedtime when he first moves in with the Griffins?
questions.explanation:
The Bible.

	Grandpa Griffin speaks enthusiastically about sinners and hell before Stewie easily nods off to sleep.  Stewie begins to take a shine to Grandpa Griffin.

questions.text: Where does Peter get Grandpa Griffin a job?
questions.explanation:
The toy factory.

	Peter gets grandpa a job at the same toy factory where he works.  Grandpa makes everyone seem like slaves with his strict work ethics.

questions.text: Who is the employee of the week at Peter's work?
questions.explanation:
Jesus.

	People begin wondering how they could compete against Jesus and begin wondering why he's not at work.  Instead, he's playing golf (and winning by cheating).

questions.text: The Pope's car breaks down outside Peter's house.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Peter steals the Pope-mobile and takes the Pope to Quahog where he plans to confront his father.  Unfortunately, it doesn't really help.

questions.text: Who does Grandpa Griffin work for at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
The Pope.

	Grandpa begins going on tour with the Pope as his personal bodyguard.  He is shown on TV making sure no one gets near the Pope.

questions.text: Who comes to the Griffins' house at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Peter's mom.

	After finally getting rid of Grandpa Griffin, Grandma Griffin knocks on the door saying she needs a place to stay during the weekend.  The Griffins escape the house in a pod.

Mr. Weed

	Mr. Weed appears when Grandpa Griffin finishes his work on the assembly line.  None of the other characters appear until the next episode.
